title: It Takes Two

constellations_other.name: Bring Me To Life
constellations_other.description: From the imaginative childrenâ€™s show Lift Off!, explore the various ways dolls and puppets are connected and come to life on screen.

description: It Takes Two is an action-adventure video game specifically designed for two players, who play as the clashing couple Cody and May: two humans turned into dolls by a magic spell. Together, trapped in a fantastical world where the unpredictable hides around every corner, they are reluctantly challenged with saving their fractured relationship.
